mapper.select: select s.Id,s.userId,s.times,s.content,s.images,s.type,s.nick,s.head,likes.`status` isLike,collection.`enable` isCollection from ( SELECT stories.*,`user`.nick,`user`.head from stories,`user`,follow WHERE `user`.Id=stories.userId and follow.userId=3 and follow.followId=`user`.Id) s LEFT JOIN likes ON s.Id=likes.storyId and likes.userId=3 LEFT JOIN collection ON collection.storyId=s.id

select s.Id,s.userId,s.times,s.content,s.images,s.type,s.nick,s.head,likes.`status` isLike,collection.`enable` isCollection from ( SELECT stories.*,`user`.nick,`user`.head from stories,`user` WHERE `user`.Id=stories.userId) s LEFT JOIN likes ON s.Id=likes.storyId and likes.userId=#{id} LEFT JOIN collection ON collection.storyId=s.id

select s.Id,s.userId,s.times,s.content,s.images,s.type,s.nick,s.head,likes.`status` isLike,collection.`enable` isCollection from ( SELECT stories.*,`user`.nick,`user`.head from stories,`user` WHERE `user`.Id=stories.userId) s LEFT JOIN likes ON s.Id=likes.storyId and likes.userId=#{id} LEFT JOIN collection ON collection.storyId=s.id ORDER BY `s`.id DESC
select stories.*,`user`.nick,`user`.head,`user`.phone,`user`.category from `user`,stories where stories.userId=#{userId} ORDER BY id

select s.Id,s.userId,s.times,s.content,s.images,s.type,s.nick,s.head,likes.`status` isLike,collection.`enable` isCollection from ( SELECT stories.*,`user`.nick,`user`.head from stories,`user` WHERE `user`.Id=stories.userId and stories.userId=#{targetId}) s LEFT JOIN likes ON s.Id=likes.storyId and likes.userId=#{userId} LEFT JOIN collection ON collection.storyId=s.id
select stories.*,`user`.head from stories,`user` where `user`.id=stories.userId and stories.Id in (select storyId from collection where userId=#{userId})
